Name: Proxy evidence for Holocene biodiversity change in oceanic islands
Description: A geographic map of the evidence that exists of long-term biodiversity change in oceanic islands. (This is placeholder text).

BaseLayers.Name: Countries
BaseLayers.Description: A political basemap based on UN country code.

Fields.Name: Proxy group
Fields.Description: The proxies used to infer biodiversity change.

Fields.Name: Ocean
Fields.Description: The ocean in which the island is located.

Fields.Name: Archipelago
Fields.Description: The archipelago in which the island is located.

Fields.Name: Sample origin (parent material)
Fields.Description: The environmental archive from which the same has been taken.

Fields.Name: Environmental drivers of change: proxies used
Fields.Description: If a multi-proxy study, the proxies applied to infer environmental properties.

Fields.Name: Are radiocarbon dates calibrated?
Fields.Description: Indicates if dates were stated in BP or cal. yr. BP (or equivalents).

Fields.Name: Length of timeline
Fields.Description: Note: represents the best estimate as stated by authors. Dates have not been harmonised, and may include both calibrated and uncalibrated radiocarbon dates.

Fields.Name: Estimate of Latest Extent (youngest age)
Fields.Description: Note: represents the best estimate as stated by authors. Dates have not been harmonised, and may include both calibrated and uncalibrated radiocarbon dates.

Fields.Name: Estimate of Earliest Extent (oldest age)
Fields.Description: Note: represents the best estimate as stated by authors. Dates have not been harmonised, and may include both calibrated and uncalibrated radiocarbon dates.

Fields.Name: Elevation of study site
Fields.Description: The elevation at which the sample was taken, according to the authors.

Fields.Name: Number of samples / levels in timeline
Fields.Description: The number of levels (or samples) that analyses were conducted within each time-series.
